content: Rebasing is preferred over merge commits for keeping history linear. Interactive
Log messages are sentences, not codes. stored entry #42 (decision), 3 triples ex
No pre-commit hooks. The test suite runs in CI only. Local commits are fast and
Spill provides three severity levels: info, warn, error. There is no debug level
Each tool repo uses a single main branch with no feature branches. Commits go di
book uses a SQLite task queue rather than Redis or a message broker. Keeps the d
Git tags are not used for versioning. Tools are pinned by commit hash when refer
Commit messages use a tool-name prefix followed by a colon: crib: add consolidat
The system does not use a message bus. Tools communicate through files and pipes
Log entries include the tool name as a structured field, not embedded in the mes
